SEARCH
Package edu.carroll.initMusic.web.controller

Class SearchController

java.lang.Object
edu.carroll.initMusic.web.controller.SearchController
@Controller public class SearchController extends Object
This Controller handles the search page, which is where users can search for songs and add them to playlists

  • Method Details

    • showSearchPage

      @GetMapping("/search") public String showSearchPage(org.springframework.ui.Model model, org.springframework.security.core.Authentication authentication, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      This shows the search page and adds several important attributes to the model for the page
      Parameters:
      model - Model to use
      authentication - Current authenticated user token, if any
      Returns:
      Search page

    • search

      @PostMapping("/search") @Transactional public String search(@RequestParam("songSearch") String songSearch, @RequestParam("artistSearch") String artistSearch, org.springframework.ui.Model model, org.springframework.security.core.Authentication authentication, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Performs the search for all songs related to the query param, and displays them on the page. Sets up the model so the user can add songs to a playlist if they wish
      Parameters:
      songSearch - Song name to search for
      artistSearch - Artist name to search for
      model - Model to use
      authentication - Current authenticated user token, if any
      Returns:
      Updated search page

    • addSongToPlaylist

      @PostMapping("/addSongToPlaylist") public String addSongToPlaylist(@Valid @ModelAttribute @Valid NewSongForm newSongForm, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result, org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.support.RedirectAttributes attrs, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Handles adding a song to a playlist. Since we can't pass a Song object through the form, we need to pass all the params needed for a song and create a new object.
      Parameters:
      newSongForm - Form that contains data needed to add song to playlist
      result - Result of binding
      attrs - RedirectAttributes
      session - Current httpSession
      Returns:
      Redirect to search page

    • previewSong

      @GetMapping("/preview/{deezerId}") public String previewSong(@PathVariable String deezerId, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Handles the mapping for opening a popup window with the preview for a song
      Parameters:
      deezerId - ID of song to preview
      model - Model to add preview url to
      Returns:
      popupRedirect page
